questions.question: Anata no machi wa donna tokoro desu ka?
questions.answer: Watashi no machi wa shizukana tokoro desu. Kireina kawa ga arimasu.
questions.speak: Watashi no machi wa shizukana tokoro desu. Kireina kawa ga arimasu.

questions.question: Yasumi no hi ni nani o shimasu ka?
questions.answer: Yasumi no hi ni, tomodachi to asobimasu. Tomodachi ni aimasu.
questions.speak: Yasumi no hi ni, tomodachi to asobimasu. Tomodachi ni aimasu.

questions.question: Ima nani o benkyou shite imasu ka?
questions.answer: Ima, nihongo o benkyou shite imasu.
questions.speak: Ima, nihongo o benkyou shite imasu.

questions.question: Anata no machi to Toukyou to dochira ga ookii desu ka?
questions.answer: Toukyou no hou ga ookii desu.
questions.speak: Toukyou no hou ga ookii desu.

questions.question: Shuumatsu ni nani o shitai desu ka?
Anata no machi de doko ga ichiban nigiyaka desu ka?
Anata no heya ni nani ga arimasu ka?
Natsu yasumi ni doko e ikitai desu ka? Doushite desu ka?
questions.answer: Natsu yasumi ni Toukyou e ikitai desu. Tanoshii kara desu.
questions.speak: Natsu yasumi ni Toukyou e ikitai desu. Tanoshii kara desu.

questions.question: Shuumatsu ni donna supootsu o shimasu ka?
Anata no machi wa nigiyaka desu ka?
questions.answer: Hai, nigiyaka desu. Hito ga ooi desu.
questions.speak: Hai, nigiyaka desu. Hito ga ooi desu.

questions.question: Anata no machi ni yama / kawa / otera / kyoukai / onsen ga arimasu ka?
questions.answer: Hai, yama ga arimasu. Kawa ga arimasu.
questions.speak: Hai, yama ga arimasu. Kawa ga arimasu.

questions.question: Anata no machi kara Hanoi made dono kurai desu ka?
questions.answer: Kuruma / hikouki de sanjikan kurai desu.
questions.speak: Kuruma / hikouki de sanjikan kurai desu.

questions.question: FPT daigaku wa donna daigaku desu ka?
questions.answer: FPT daigaku wa ookii daigaku desu.
questions.speak: FPT daigaku wa ookii daigaku desu.

questions.question: Donna supootsu / ryouri / kudamono ga ichiban suki desu ka?
questions.answer: Sakkaa / raamen / ringo ga ichiban suki desu.
questions.speak: Sakkaa / raamen / ringo ga ichiban suki desu.

questions.question: Betonamu kara Kankoku made hikouki de dono kurai desu ka?
Kinou, dokoka e ikimashita ka?
questions.answer: Iie, doko e mo ikimasen deshita.
questions.speak: Iie, doko e mo ikimasen deshita.
